sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { ChevronRight, BookOpen, Bookmark, Edit } from 'lucide-react'; const MainContent = ({ activeTab, theme, verseOfDay, recentBooks, bookmarks, notes }) => (
{activeTab === 'home' && ( <> {/* Verse of the Day */}

Verse of the Day

{new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', {weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric'})}

{verseOfDay.text}

{verseOfDay.reference} ({verseOfDay.translation})

{/* Quick Access */}

Continue Reading

{recentBooks.map((book, index) => (
{book.name} - Chapter {book.chapter}
))}
{/* Bookmarks */}

Bookmarks

    {bookmarks.map((bookmark, index) => (

  • {bookmark.reference}

    {bookmark.preview}

    • ))}
{/* Notes */}

Recent Notes

    {notes.map((note, index) => (

  • {note.reference}

    {note.title}

    {note.date}

    • ))}
)}
); export default MainContent;
